column5: I can't believe you remember this game!
Nothing beats real golf, you know?
Oh man, I really missed this music!
I'ma come back so fast you might as well call me Huntr/x
Yeah, 'cause your score just keeps going up, up, up.
Ugh, are you sure you don't secretly play this every day?
Okay we get it! You like golf!
Because it makes me feel hole-y
I feel bad for whichever god is stuck listening to your prayers
But I'll crush you again the next time you come over
You mean, the next time I swing by?
